name: 1980s singer Cyndi Lauper Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which is NOT the name of a Cyndi Lauper album?
questions.explanation:
True Blue.

	'True Blue' was an album by Madonna.

questions.text: For what TV series did Cyndi win an Emmy Award?
questions.explanation:
Mad About You.

	She won for Outstanding Guest Actress playing Ira's ex-wife.

questions.text: Finish the title of this Cyndi Lauper concert video 'Cyndi Lauper in _____ ' ?
questions.explanation:
Paris.

	Cyndi filmed this concert while on her worldwide True Colors tour.

questions.text: Who starred with Cyndi in the film 'Life With Mikey'?
questions.explanation:
Michael J Fox.

	Fox starred as Mikey, and Cyndi was his ditzy secretary.

questions.text: What children's show does Cyndi sing the theme song to?
questions.explanation:
Pee-Wee's Playhouse.

	That's her on the theme to her friend Pee-Wee's show.

questions.text: Name Cyndi's first movie, also starring Jeff Goldblum?
questions.explanation:
Vibes.

	Peter Falk also starred in this action-adventure flick.

questions.text: What girl group sang back-up on the hit 'Change Of Heart'?
questions.explanation:
The Bangles.

	The Bangles provided backing vocals on that top 10 hit.

questions.text: What sport was Cyndi involved with in the 1980s?
questions.explanation:
wrestling.

	She made lots of friends in the wrestling world including Captain Lou Albano who played Cyndi's Dad in the video 'Girls Just Wanna Have Fun'.

questions.text: What film is Cyndi's song 'Disco Inferno' in?
Which other diva did Cyndi tour with in 1999?
questions.explanation:
Cher.

	Cyndi was the opening act on Cher's Believe tour.
